abstract.p: Fully custom and personalized improved pair of socks that may be produced from a blend of spandex, polyester, cotton, bamboo fibers, copper, nylon, etc. The socks could be produced in various heights such as ankle, crew, mid-calf, etc. The top of the sock would feature a cushioned, no slip edging, etc. In addition, the heel would feature a cushioned, no slip support while cushioned support would rest around the ankle. The main modification of this cushioned sock would deal with the inclusion of pockets, sleeves, openings, etc. upon its outer sole which would allow various materials to be inserted to relieve pain, support, better balance, help plantar fasciitis, and possibly many other health concerns. The inserts may be produced from various materials to accommodate different needs. The inserts, insoles, gel beds, etc. could rest beneath the hell, ball, and arch of the foot. They may be produced from a plethora of material foam, rubber, plastic, with gel interior, etc. In addition, they may be produced in various widths, sizes and shapes, etc. to accommodate different needs. The interior of the pockets, sleeves, openings, etc. could contain gel, adhesive, magnets, etc. they may ensure the insert remained in the proper place for the wearer. Alternatively, the insoles, inserts, footbeds may be held in place by magnets. The inserts may provide support and added comfort for the user's feet and may decrease the amount of back problems, gait issues, foot and leg fatigue, etc. Also envisioning a removable plantar fascist wrap accompanying the SOUL SOXS going from mid high sock to crew that would hold various arch supports in place. The socks could be produced in a plethora of colors and an array of sizes appropriate for wearing by men, women, and children. SOUL SOXS is designed to provide added comfort for the user's feet. This product would comprise of socks containing the support offered by insoles throughout its design. More specifically, these personalized and customizable socks with inserts, insoles, etc. would feature fully customizable from colors, textures, materials, infusions, and could feature cushioned, no-slip area upon the sock's openings, slots, pockets as well as upon the heel. Cushioned ankle support would be incorporated. Pockets, slots would be incorporated to provide inserts for the ball, heel, and arch areas of the toot. The arch area may also contain a removable plantar fasciitis wrap that would anchor the arch support insert. Various types and thickness of insets could be positioned within the pockets. They may be produced with gel, from plastic or rubber, or as expanded foam. When worn, the SOUL SOXS may reduce the incidence of pain and problems within the feet as well as the lower back and other areas of the body. Using this product, the wearer may reduce his incidence of sore feet and other more serious foot ailments. Infusions are fully custom and personalized within designed to provide the wearers with personal, customizable comfort. This product may provide enhanced comfort and relief from pain as it would incorporate support, like an insole within a shoe. While the SOUL SOXS could be worn by a wide array of individuals, it may be of particular appeal to anyone who suffers with arthritis, diabetes, or back pain as well as various foot problems such as bunions, flat feet, hammer toes, heel spurs, plantar fasciitis, gait, neuropathic pain, etc. to individual needs of consumer for a variety of health issues associated with the feet, wellness, health, with essential oils, fragrances for beauty etc. (would be able to control each added infusions)

description.heading: BACKGROUND OF THE INVENTION
Field of the Invention
description.p: The present invention relates to Fully custom and personalized improved pair of socks that may be produced from a blend of spandex, polyester, cotton, bamboo fibers, copper, nylon, etc. The socks could be produced in various heights such as ankle, crew, mid-calf, etc. The top of the sock could feature a cushioned, no slip edging, etc. In addition, the heel would feature a cushioned, no slip support while cushioned support would rest around the ankle. The main modification of this cushioned sock would deal with the inclusion of pockets, sleeves, openings, etc. upon its outer sole which would allow various materials to be inserted to relieve pain, support, better balance, help plantar fasciitis, and possibly many other health concerns. The inserts may be produced from various materials to accommodate different needs. The inserts, insoles, gel beds, etc. could rest beneath the hell, ball, and arch of the foot. They may be produced from a plethora of material foam, rubber, plastic, with gel interior, etc. In addition, they may be produced in various widths, sizes and shapes, etc. Lo accommodate different needs. The interior of the pockets, sleeves, openings, etc. could contain gel, adhesive, magnets, etc. they may ensure the insert remained in the proper place for the wearer. Alternatively, the insoles, inserts, footbeds may be held in place by magnets. The inserts may provide support and added comfort for the user's feet and may decrease the amount of back problems, gait issues, foot and leg fatigue, etc. Also envisioning a removable plantar fascist wrap accompanying the SOUL SOXS going from mid high sock to crew that could hold various arch supports in place. The socks could be produced in a plethora of colors and an array of sizes appropriate for wearing by men, women, and children and be fully customizable in infusions, colors, textures, materials, etc. for both the socks and accompanying insoles, footbeds, inserts, gel beds, etc.

“SOUL SOXS” are being suggested by my because I believe, have worn, and they would fulfill the need for socks designed with a personalized or customizable design to reduce the incidence of soreness, pain, and fatigue within the feet, legs, and back amongst other health issues it could possibly help. The appealing features of SOUL SOXS would be their comfort, durability, reasonable price, and practicality. The inclusion of the pockets, slots, sleeves, etc. that could accept various inserts may provide added comfort and support to protect the user's feet and may save the consumer the money that may have been spent for visits to the podiatrist, general practitioner, or orthopedic surgeon. The “SOUL SOXS” would provide customizable cushioning and support for the user's feet that could relieve the shock often experienced by the feet and spine when standing, walking, running, etc. This could provide added comfort and may reduce the incidence of back problems as well as sore and swollen feet. Which would work with the wearer's acupuncture points. The various types of inserts may provide support for the arch or heel in a variety of shapes, sizes, textures, etc. The inserts may be produced from a plethora of materials such as with gel interior, expanded foam, rubber, plastic, etc. This practical product could provide the support of insoles without wearing shoes. Thus, a pair of insoles would not require being purchased for every pair of shoes or one pair continually moved from shoe to shoe. The SOUL SOXS could provide support for the feet without the need for shoes which could be of appeal when walking around one's home. This affordable hosiery product could easily be laundered in a washing machine.
description.heading: Description of the Prior Art
description.p: SOUL SOXS have been created by myself (John Gagne Morgan and my wife Christine Michelle Anderson) because I believe, have worn, and they would fulfill the need for socks designed with a personalized or customizable design to reduce the incidence of soreness, pain, and fatigue within the feet, legs, and back amongst other health issues it could possibly help. The appealing features of SOUL SOXS would be their comfort, durability, reasonable price, and practicality. The inclusion of the pockets, slots, sleeves, etc. that could accept various inserts may provide added comfort and support to protect the user's feet and may save the consumer the money that may have been spent for visits to the podiatrist, general practitioner, or orthopedic surgeon.

The “SOUL SOXS” would provide customizable cushioning and support for the user's feet that could relieve the shock often experienced by the feet and spine when standing, walking, running, etc. This could provide added comfort and may reduce the incidence of back problems as well as sore and swollen feet. Which would work with the wearer's acupuncture points. The various types of inserts may provide support for the arch or heel in a variety of shapes, sizes, textures, etc.

The inserts may be produced from a plethora of materials such as with gel interior, expanded foam, rubber, plastic, etc. This practical product could provide the support of insoles without wearing shoes. Thus, a pair of insoles would not require being purchased for every pair of shoes or one pair continually moved from shoe to shoe. The SOUL SOXS could provide support for the feet without the need for shoes which could be of appeal when walking around one's home. This affordable hosiery product could easily be laundered in a washing machine. A deluxe model of the SOUL SOXS may massage the feet while also providing warmth or cooling.

Since SOUL SOXS would represent a modification of an existing product, they would be readily producible. This product could be produced using processes commonly employed in the production of standard socks. The socks could be produced from a blend of spandex, polyester, cotton, bamboo fiber, copper fibers, etc. The cushioned elastic around the top of throughout the sock could be incorporated using standard processes. The pockets, slots, openings, etc. could feature a durable edging for easy access to accommodate the inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. as they may be produced from plastic, 3D printed materials, rubber, with gel, or expanded foam, etc. 3D printed materials, user would be able to fully customize both the socks and inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. which costs 0.40 cents a few dollars if that to produce on a lot of these materials, textures, socks, etc. and could sell for many times what it is produced for.

The human foot has 42 muscles, 26 bones, 33 joints, and at least 50 ligaments and tendons made of strong fibrous tissues to keep all the moving parts together. In addition, the foot also contains 250,000 sweat glands. Where infusions of Essential Oils, Vitamins, CBD, THC Deltas, etc. could be infused directly into or onto the skin. The foot is an evolutionary marvel that is capable of handling hundreds of tons of force, the body's weight in motion, every day. Its many parts, including the toes heel, and ball, work in harmony to get individuals from one place to another. But the stress of carrying the body around puts the feet at high risk of injury, more so than other parts of the body. Because the feet are very small compared with the rest of the body the impact of each step exerts tremendous force upon them. This force is about 50 percent greater than the person's body weight. During a typical day, people spend about 4 hours on their feet and take 8,000 to 10,000 steps. This means that the feet support a combined force equivalent to several hundred tons every day.

Many foot problems, including hammertoes, blisters, bunions, corns, and calluses, heel spurs, claw and mallet toes, ingrown toenails, toenail fungus and athlete's foot can develop due to neglect, ill-fitting shoes, inserts, or insoles, and simple wear and tear. The feet may also indicate if the body is under threat from a serious disease. For example, gout will attach the foot joints first.

The foot is a complex anatomical structure that may be affected by disease within the body or the foot itself. The arches of the foot are the primary structures that control the amount of ground force transmitted into the body. The foot serves the following functions supports weight, act as a shock absorber, serves as a lever to propel the leg forward, and helps maintain balance by adjusting the body to uneven surfaces.

Foot pain generally starts in one of three places: the toes, the forefoot, or the hindfoot. Toe problems most often occur because of the pressure imposed by ill-fitting shoes. The forefoot is the front of the foot. Pain originating in this area usually involves the metatarsal or sesamoid bones. The metatarsal bones are the five long bones that extend from the front of the arch to bones in the toe. The sesamoid bones are the two small bones embedded at the top of first metatarsal bone, which connects to the big toe. The hindfoot is the back of the toot. Pain originating in this area can extend from the heel, across the sole (known as the plantar surface), to the ball of the foot (the metatarsophalangeal joint).

Nearly all causes of foot pain can be grouped under one of three causes. Firs, poorly fitting shoes are a frequent cause of foot pain. High-heeled shoes concentrate pressure on the toes and can aggravate, if not cause problems with the toes. Second, certain medical conditions that cause a disturbance in way a person walks can contribute to foot pain. Included may be diseases or conditions that lead to pain or numbness in the feet (such as diabetes), leg and foot deformities, spinal problems, and neurological disorders such as Parkinson's disease or cerebral palsy. Third, high impact exercising, such as jogging or strenuous aerobics can injure their feet and other parts of the leg. Common injuries include corns, calluses, blisters, muscle cramps, acute knee and ankle injuries, plantar fasciitis, and metatarsalgia.

SOUL SOXS is designed to provide personalized and customizable added comfort for the user's feet. This product would comprise of socks containing the support offered by insoles throughout its design. More specifically, these personalized and customizable socks with inserts, insoles, etc. would feature fully customizable options from colors, textures, materials, infusions, and could feature cushioned, no-slip area upon the sock's openings, slots, pockets as well as upon the heel. Cushioned ankle support would be incorporated. Pockets, slots would be incorporated to provide inserts for the ball, heel, and arch areas of the foot. The arch area may also contain a removable plantar fasciitis wrap that would anchor the arch support insert. Various types and thickness of insets could be positioned within the pockets. They may be produced with gel, from plastic or rubber, or as expanded foam. When worn, the SOUL SOXS may reduce the incidence of pain and problems within the feet as well as the lower back and other areas of the body. Using this product, the wearer may reduce his incidence of sore feet and other more serious foot ailments.

SOUL SOXS may also be of use to individuals with diabetes. According to the American Diabetes Association, there are an estimated 23.1 million individuals in the U.S. who are diagnosed with diabetes; analysts believe another 7.2 million are undiagnosed. The prevalence of older Americans (age 65 and older) remains high, at 25.2 percent (12 million seniors).

Each year, there are about 1.5 million new cases. Diabetes is most common in American Indians/Alaskan Natives (15.1 percent), followed by Non-Hispanic African Americans (12.7 percent), Hispanics (12.1 percent), Asian Americans (8 percent), and non-Hispanic Caucasians (7.4 percent).

In addition, it may provide added comfort for anyone with arthritis, at least 54 million adults in the United States reported that a doctor had diagnosed them with arthritis or a related rheumatic condition, according to the Arthritis Foundation. Doctor-diagnosed arthritis is more common in women (26 percent) as compared to men (18 percent). Additionally, in some types of arthritis, such as rheumatoid arthritis, women far outnumber men. Interestingly, nearly 300,000 babies and children have arthritis or a rhematic condition. Arthritis is the leading cause of disability among adults in the U.S. The most common type of arthritis is osteoarthritis. Osteoarthritis affects an estimated 31 million Americans. About two-thirds of adults in the U.S. with arthritis are considered working age (18-64 years). Arthritis is much more prevalent among people who have other chronic conditions. Specifically, 49 percent of adults with heart disease also have arthritis, while 47 percent of adults with diabetes and 31 percent of adults who are obese also have arthritis. By 2040, the number of people expected to have doctor-diagnosed arthritis is estimated to be more than 78 million.

According to the National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health, approximately 1 percent of U.S. adults reported a diagnosis of plantar fasciitis in the 12 months prior to a recent National Health and Wellness Survey. Plantar fasciitis is a progressive degenerative condition that affects the thick bond of tissue covering the bones on the bottom of the foot. This condition has been associated with heel pain, falls, poor quality of life and disability. Plantar fascists is more likely to affect order adults, specifically those ages 45-64 (1.33 percent), while those aged 18 to 44 have the lowest prevalence (0.53 percent).

Overall prevalence of diagnosed plantar fasciitis with pain was about 0.85 percent. Among the findings of the analysis on characteristics of plantar fasciitis pain, 25 percent responded having severe pain, while 45 percent reported to having moderate pain, and 28 percent had mild pain. More than 61 percent of those diagnosed with plantar fasciitis indicated that they suffer from pain daily, while almost 54 percent reported that their pain interfered with normal work activities at least moderately.

The Secondary Market would consist of various members of the labor force who spend a great deal of time standing or walking. There are approximately 151.44 million Americans (age 16 and older) in the civilian labor force, comprised of 80.57 million men and 70.86 million women aged 16 and older.

description.heading: SUMMARY OF THE INVENTION
description.p: It is an object of the present invention to provide customizable fit for wearer with socks.
It is another object of the present invention to provide added comfort through the inclusion of customizable insoles, inserts, footbeds, etc.

It is a further object of the present invention to provide customizable infusions through both the article of footwear i.e. sock and for the insole, insert, footbed, and any retaining materials, textures, gel beds, etc. for infusions of Essential Oils, CBD, Essential Vitamins, Etc.
These and other objects of the present invention will be apparent from review of the following specification and the accompanying drawings.

description.heading: DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF THE PREFERRED EMBODIMENTS
description.p: Other embodiments of the invention will be apparent to those skilled in the art from consideration of the specification and practice of the invention disclosed herein. It is intended that the specification and examples be considered as exemplary only, with a true scope and spirit of the invention being indicated by the following claims. Full custom and personalized improved pair of socks that may be produced from a blend of spandex, polyester, cotton, bamboo fibers, copper, nylon, etc. The socks could be produced in various heights such as ankle, crew, mid-calf, etc. The top of the sock would feature a cushioned, no slip edging, etc. In addition, the heel would feature a cushioned, no slip support while cushioned support could rest around the ankle. The main modification of this cushioned sock would deal with the inclusion of pockets, sleeves, openings, etc. upon its outer sole which would allow various materials to be inserted to relieve pain, support, better balance, help plantar fasciitis, and possibly many other health concerns. The inserts may be produced from various materials to accommodate different needs. The inserts, insoles, gel beds, etc. could rest beneath the hell, ball, and arch of the foot. They may be produced from a plethora of material foam, rubber, plastic, with gel interior, etc. In addition, they may be produced in various widths, sizes and shapes, etc. to accommodate different needs. The interior of the pockets, sleeves, openings, etc. could contain gel, adhesive, magnets, etc. they may ensure the insert remained in the proper place for the wearer. Alternatively, the insoles, inserts, footbeds may be held in place by magnets. The inserts may provide support and added comfort for the user's feet and may decrease the amount of back problems, gait issues, foot and leg fatigue, etc. Also envisioning a removable plantar fasciitis wrap accompanying the SOUL SOXS going from mid high sock to crew that would hold various arch supports in place. The socks could be produced in a plethora of colors and an array of sizes appropriate for wearing by men, women, and children. The concept of Soul SoxS is an improved pair of socks designed to provide wearers with the ability to incorporate support within the sock comprising of an insole/insert/footbed etc. within a shoe. The Inserts may be produced from various materials expanded foam, rubber, plastic, with a gel interior, etc. to accommodate different needs for the consumer for different areas of the foot. The Soul SoxS would be comprising of a pair of socks that may be produced from a blend of spandex, polyester, cotton, nylon, etc. The socks could be produced in various heights, such as ankle, crew, mid-calf, high compression, athletic, also models made with a plantar fasciitis wrap that goes up to calf and folds down for ankle or plantar support going from high sock Multi Layered Soul Compression shown as 620 in FIG. 6A. to low cut sock, etc. The top of the socks would feature a cushioned, no slip edging, in addition, some models of the Soul Sox would have a heel that feature a cushioned no slip support and addition a certain model(s) would have extra cushioned support around the ankle i.e., FIG. 2A-2B and FIG. 6A. The main modification of Soul SoxS sock with inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. would deal with the inclusion of pockets, slots, sleeves, openings, etc. upon its outer sole, heel, arch, mid foot, under toes, etc. The pockets, sleeves, openings, etc. are seen in every model of Soul SoxS and would have gel lining, adhesive, magnets, etc. to hold the 1-3 Part inserts in place. see FIG. 3A-4B. As seen in FIG. 3A Article of footwear, sock shown as 300 would have multiple openings, sleeves, pockets, etc. shown as 302-310 would be able to accept different articles of materials, textures, sizes, widths, etc. that would attach to the 1-3-part system of inserts/insoles/footbeds etc.

Soul SoxS by entering the pockets, slots, sleeves, openings, etc. 306 shown as the heel opening, pocket, sleeve, etc. would Ideally be used to take in the main Insert, Footbed, Insole, etc. which starts at the heel to mid arch as shown as 302 the main insole, insert, footbed, etc. of some models of Soul SoxS. The main Insert, Footbed, insole in FIG. 1A depicts a sock shown as 100 would have 1-3 different pieces with 102 being the main base support from heel to mid arch, 2nd part shown as 104 would be mid foot right before toes and 3rd shown as 106 in FIG. 1A being under the toes. The 3-part system would all come with 6 Layers of Soul Support Technology as seen in FIG. 1C. As seen in that FIGURE, 122-126 are layered with 6 Layers of Soul Support Technology which includes but not limited to a Bubbly, Checkered Rubber material, infused with Coconut Oil, Essential Vitamins, Essential Oils, THC(Delta 9)Aloe Vera, Shea Butter, etc. or the user would be able to decide what materials, textures, etc. that they want customized through different customizable options and infusions for various fragrances, oils, CBD, etc. for either the Soul SoxS actual sock or whether it's the different materials, textures, etc. that they choose to use in the inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. although can be customized depending on the consumer wants and needs for textures, sizes, widths of inserts, etc. 122 would connect to 124 and or 126 by magnetic, adhesive, etc. support between each layers of Support or through themselves making one solid insert, footbed, insole if so, chosen by the wearer. All dependent on what sizes, materials, textures, etc. are used in combination of the 1-3-part system for the inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. to either adhere, magnetize, stick to directly, or one on top of the other, etc. The consumer could always use the main insert, Footbed, insole shown as 122 by itself as their main base support for the insert while having different textures, materials, sizes, etc. added on through magnets, adhesive, gel, etc. The other parts of Soul SoxS Inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. shown as 124 and 126 could rest in their respective pockets, slots, sleeves, openings, etc. and being all 1 to 3 different parts to the insert, insole, footbed would bend with the consumer's movements and foot. The consumer would be able to flip and alternate the other 3 parts of the Insole between textures, materials, textiles, sizes, shapes, colors etc. on 102, 104 and 106. If one side of the insert shown as 104 was cushioned and the other side of that section of insert could be gel for example. It really depends on what the customer would like to feel and what they see fit for their comfort and relief. Every pair of Soul SoxS comes with Six Layers of Soul Support infused with Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Aloe Vera, CBD, or whatever the customer chooses etc. as seen in FIG. 1C. Insert/Insoles/Footbed 122-126 shows the Six Layers of Soul Support Technology which is made of a Honeycomb/Square looking as seen in FIG. 1C. and made from a Bubbly like Rubber materials, textures, etc. infused with odor eating Technology and Coconut Oil, Aloe Vera, Shea Butter, or whatever the customer chooses, etc. Customer would be able to divert from the 6Layers of Soul Support to what they see fit, whether it is removing a layer(s) and putting whatever they see fit such as gel, expanded foam, foam, rubber, plastic with a gel interior, etc. without diverting from the main invention. The main base insert shown as 102 in FIG. 1A. starting at heel to mid arch would be able to flip over and alternate between different sides. Some models would just have 104 and 106 being able to flip over and alternate sides with 102 being the main base sole with medial and lateral arch support. 102-106 would be able to alternate between the 1-6 Layers of Soul Support to a completely different texture, material, size, etc. as mentioned above if so chosen. The 6 Layered Support (6LS) could be different colors, shapes, sizes, textures, etc. and would be held together by magnets, adhesive, gel, layer by layer etc. shown as 128-132 in FIG. 1C. for each layer and each texture, shape, width, etc. to accommodate user needs. The interior of the Soul SoxS pockets, sleeves, openings, would contain a gel lining, magnets, adhesive, etc. to hold the main Footbed, Insole, Inserts, etc. as seen in place in FIG. 1B. 108-112 as shown have square magnets, adhesive, gel lining etc. shown with squiggly magnetic/adhesive/gel/etc. to hold each layer of the 6Layer Support in place as seen in FIG. 1C. 6 layers are provided dependent on the customer needing 6 or not, they can always go down or up with what the customer desires in textures, sizes, materials, etc. as mentioned above. 128-132 depicts it would be able to apply any desired texture, material, shape, size etc. without diverting from original invention. Each part from the main base 102-106 to the other parts of the main footbed/insert and any element, material, texture, etc. applied to those through 108-112 magnets/adhesive/etc. and added through 128-132. Consumer could customize both the Socks and the inserts completely to their liking without diverting from the original invention. Both the Socks and Insert items would be completely customizable in colors, designs, textures, materials, oil infusions, etc.
description.heading: SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION OF INVENTION
description.p: Fully custom and personalized improved pair of socks that may be produced from a blend of spandex, polyester, cotton, bamboo fibers, copper, nylon, etc. The socks could be produced in various heights such as ankle, crew, mid-calf, etc. The top of the sock would feature a cushioned, no slip edging, etc. In addition, the heel would feature a cushioned, no slip support while cushioned support could rest around the ankle. The main modification of this cushioned sock would deal with the inclusion of pockets, sleeves, openings, etc. upon its outer sole which would allow various materials to be inserted to relieve pain, support, better balance, help plantar fasciitis, and possibly many other health concerns. The inserts may be produced from various materials to accommodate different needs. The inserts, insoles, gel beds, etc. could rest beneath the hell, ball, and arch of the foot. They may be produced from a plethora of material foam, rubber, plastic, with gel interior, etc. In addition, they may be produced in various widths, sizes and shapes, etc. to accommodate different needs. The interior of the pockets, sleeves, openings, etc. could contain gel, adhesive, magnets, etc. they may ensure the insert remained in the proper place for the wearer. Alternatively, the insoles, inserts, footbeds may be held in place by magnets. The inserts may provide support and added comfort for the user's feet and may decrease the amount of back problems, gait issues, foot and leg fatigue, etc. Also envisioning a removable plantar fascist wrap accompanying the SOUL SOXS going from mid high sock to crew that would hold various arch supports in place. The socks could be produced in a plethora of colors and an array of sizes appropriate for wearing by men, women, and children.

The concept of Soul SoxS is an improved pair of socks designed to provide wearers with the ability to incorporate support within the sock comprising of an insole/insert/footbed etc. within a shoe. The Inserts may be produced from various materials expanded foam, rubber, plastic, with a gel interior, etc. to accommodate different needs for the consumer for different areas of the foot. The Soul SoxS would be comprising of a pair of socks that may be produced from a blend of spandex, polyester, cotton, nylon, etc. The socks could be produced in various heights, such as ankle, crew, mid-calf, high compression, athletic, also models made with a plantar fasciitis wrap that goes up to calf and folds down for ankle or plantar support going from high sock Multi Layered Soul Compression shown as 620 in FIG. 6A. to low cut sock, etc. The top of the socks would feature a cushioned, no slip edging, in addition, some models of the Soul Sox would have a heel that feature a cushioned no slip support and addition a certain model(s) would have extra cushioned support around the ankle i.e., FIG. 2A-2B and FIG. 6A.

The main modification of Soul SoxS sock with inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. would deal with the inclusion of pockets, slots, sleeves, openings, etc. upon its outer sole, heel, arch, mid foot, under toes, etc. The pockets, sleeves, openings, etc. are seen in every model of Soul SoxS and would have gel lining, adhesive, magnets, etc. to hold the 1-3 Part inserts in place. see FIG. 3A-4B. As seen in FIG. 3A Article of footwear, sock shown as 300 would have multiple openings, sleeves, pockets, etc. shown as 302-310 would be able to accept different articles of materials, textures, sizes, widths, etc. that would attach to the 1-3-part system of inserts/insoles/footbeds etc.

Soul SoxS by entering the pockets, slots, sleeves, openings, etc. 306 shown as the heel opening, pocket, sleeve, etc. would Ideally be used to take in the main Insert, Footbed, Insole, etc. which starts at the heel to mid arch as shown as 302 the main insole, insert, footbed, etc. of some models of Soul SoxS. The main Insert, Footbed, insole in FIG. 1A depicts a sock shown as 100 would have 1-3 different pieces with 102 being the main base support from heel to mid arch, 2nd part shown as 104 would be mid foot right before toes and 3rd shown as 106 in FIG. 1A being under the toes. The 3-part system would all come with 6 Layers of Soul Support Technology as seen in FIG. 1C. As seen in that FIGURE, 122-126 are layered with 6 Layers of Soul Support Technology which includes but not limited to a Bubbly, Checkered Rubber material, infused with Coconut Oil, Essential Vitamins, Essential Oils, THC(Delta 9)Aloe Vera, Shea Butter, etc. or the user would be able to decide what materials, textures, etc. that they want customized through different customizable options and infusions for various fragrances, oils, CBD, etc. for either the Soul SoxS actual sock or whether it's the different materials, textures, etc. that they choose to use in the inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. although can be customized depending on the consumer wants and needs for textures, sizes, widths of inserts, etc. 122 would connect to 124 and or 126 by magnetic, adhesive, etc. support between each layers of Support or through themselves making one solid insert, footbed, insole if so, chosen by the wearer. All dependent on what sizes, materials, textures, etc. are used in combination of the 1-3-part system for the inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. to either adhere, magnetize, stick to directly, or one on top of the other, etc. The consumer could always use the main insert, Footbed, insole shown as 122 by itself as their main base support for the insert while having different textures, materials, sizes, etc. added on through magnets, adhesive, gel, etc. The other parts of Soul SoxS Inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. shown as 124 and 126 could rest in their respective pockets, slots, sleeves, openings, etc. and being all 1 to 3 different parts to the insert, insole, footbed would bend with the consumer's movements and foot. The consumer would be able to flip and alternate the other 3 parts of the Insole between textures, materials, textiles, sizes, shapes, colors etc. on 102, 104 and 106. If one side of the insert shown as 104 was cushioned and the other side of that section of insert could be gel for example. It really depends on what the customer would like to feel and what they see fit for their comfort and relief. Every pair of Soul SoxS comes with Six Layers of Soul Support infused with Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Aloe Vera, CBD, or whatever the customer chooses etc. as seen in FIG. 1C. Insert/Insoles/Footbed 122-126 shows the Six Layers of Soul Support Technology which is made of a Honeycomb/Square looking as seen in FIG. 1C. and made from a Bubbly like Rubber materials, textures, etc. infused with odor eating Technology and Coconut Oil, Aloe Vera, Shea Butter, or whatever the customer chooses, etc. Customer would be able to divert from the 6Layers of Soul Support to what they see fit, whether it is removing a layer(s) and putting whatever they see fit such as gel, expanded foam, foam, rubber, plastic with a gel interior, etc. without diverting from the main invention. The main base insert shown as 102 in FIG. 1A. starting at heel to mid arch would be able to flip over and alternate between different sides. Some models would just have 104 and 106 being able to flip over and alternate sides with 102 being the main base sole with medial and lateral arch support. 102-106 would be able to alternate between the 1-6 Layers of Soul Support to a completely different texture, material, size, etc. as mentioned above if so chosen. The 6 Layered Support(6LS) could be different colors, shapes, sizes, textures, etc. and would be held together by magnets, adhesive, gel, layer by layer etc. shown as 128-132 in FIG. 1C. for each layer and each texture, shape, width, etc. to accommodate user needs. The interior of the Soul SoxS pockets, sleeves, openings, would contain a gel lining, magnets, adhesive, etc. to hold the main Footbed, Insole, Inserts, etc. as seen in place in FIG. 1B. 108-112 as shown have square magnets, adhesive, gel lining etc. shown with squiggly magnetic/adhesive/gel/etc. to hold each layer of the 6Layer Support in place as seen in FIG. 1C. 6 layers are provided dependent on the customer needing 6 or not, they can always go down or up with what the customer desires in textures, sizes, materials, etc. as mentioned above. 128-132 depicts it would be able to apply any desired texture, material, shape, size etc. without diverting from original invention. Each part from the main base 102-106 to the other parts of the main footbed/insert and any element, material, texture, etc. applied to those through 108-112 magnets/adhesive/etc. and added through 128-132.

Consumer could customize both the Socks and the Inserts completely to their liking without diverting from the original invention. Both the Socks and Insert items would be completely customizable in colors, designs, textures, materials, oil infusions, etc. Infusions are fully custom and personalized within designed to provide the wearers with personal, customizable comfort. This product may provide enhanced comfort and relief from pain as it would incorporate support, like an insole within a shoe. While the SOUL SOXS could be worn by a wide array of individuals, it may be of particular appeal to anyone who suffers with arthritis, diabetes, or back pain as well as various foot problems such as bunions, flat feet, hammer toes, heel spurs, plantar fasciitis, gait, neuropathic pain, etc. to individual needs of consumer for a variety of health issues associated with the feet, wellness, health, with essential oils, fragrances for beauty etc. (would be able to control each added infusions)

Fully custom socks made from a variety of customized materials, textures, sizes, shapes, designs, etc. that have multiple openings, slots, pockets, gel lining, magnetic bottom (either within sock or on bottom of sock) and within the sock to retain the multiple pieces of footbed, inserts, insoles, and smaller pieces i.e. added layers, textures, materials to both the outer, inner, bottom, top, etc. of the socks as well as the inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. which would connect by magnets, gel adhesive, gel lining, etc. to make multiple sections of the insert, insole, footbed, as one full insert, insole, footbed, etc. The insert, insole, footbeds, etc. being connected by magnets, gel adhesive, gel lining, etc. to be able to bend with user's foot as more comparable to an athletic shoe being a 1-3 part system, being all custom infusions of Oils i.e. THC, CBD, Plant Based Substances, Non Plant Based Substances, Coconut Oils, Lavender, Varieties of Scents, etc. either directly into the inserts/insoles/footbeds, gel beds etc. that are able to retain the listed above substances, scents, etc. depending on the many different textures, materials, etc. made with but are not limited to polymer materials, 3D printed materials said layers that stay in place or adhere by gel, magnets, gel lining, etc. that can be inserted into an article of footwear e.g. custom socks, hosiery, garment as stated in previous arts fully customizable socks, e.g. colors, textures, materials, as well as fully customizable infusions whether it's any of the below listed substances where and when legal either applied by transdermal type patches within the layers and able to control the amount of , salve, lotion, oil, lavenders, fragrances, Coconut Oils, CBD, delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol, glycerin, melatonin, etc. (WITHOUT CLAIM to above listed substances all plant-based substances and non-plant substances)

According to consumer's wants and needs may be infused via manually be able to reinfuse with said substances above and if so chosen for example directly onto the layers, layer by layer, or dependent on textures and materials that rest in a footbed, inserts, insoles, etc., i.e. gel beds that retain Coconut Oils, CBD, Essential Oils, Etc. Just depends on (any of the LISTED SUBSTANCES above could be filled in a plastic, ceramic, recycled materials i.e. baster like syringes with plastic needles that are able to refill, be pre filled depending how much the user needs and wants of MG's for CBD, and that is safe, etc. user would be able to use the syringes, basters, etc., that insert dosages directly into the gel bed replacing any empty gel bed plant based substances, non-plant substances, oils, fragrances, etc. pretty much Anything that can be used and infused as ways listed above and below in the arts to the substances that, etc. and for example the syringe, plastic baster, plastic syringe, ceramic syringe with a metal, plastic, ceramic, needle, or anything similar to a medical syringe, etc. could insert directly into gel retaining footbeds, different retaining layers, 3D printed materials, retaining deep heel cups gel beds, or any sizes or any other part of the insole, insert, footbed, that could accept different substances can retain the (ABOVE LISTED SUBSTANCES) such as THC, CBD oils or any type of infusions of Essential Oils etc. The areas of inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc, that retain the actual layers, textures, materials, etc. would be able to be in variety of all different sizes to retain many different MG's of CBD, THC, Essential oils. Fragrances, plant-based substances, non-plant base substances ETC. for example see FIG. 1A as seen 102 could be a certain number of MG of CBD, as 104 could be an essential oil(s) as 106 could be a fragrance, etc. as the user would be able to have gel beds, textures, materials pre filled within retaining footbed, materials, layers, etc. that may roll on straight to textures, i.e. similar to highlighter sized deodorant stick, lip stick sized roller prefilled sticks, where user can manually infuse the layers, textures, materials that lay and rest within the insole, inserts, footbeds, etc. and that come infused to customer's customization on what oils if any they want chosen listed but not limited to CBD, THC, THC Delta 9, Plant Based Substances, Non Plant Based Substances, Etc. and act similar to a Tide White out pens where user directly infuses the layers by rolling on the pens, etc. could know on certain models without diverting from original invention know exactly how much to infuse, how much they infused, and if they want infusions at all.
description.heading: FIG. 1A
description.p: Depicted in FIG. 1A. shows an overhead view of the inserts shown as 102-106 that are occupied by an article of footwear 100 sock. 102 is the main part of the insert, insole, footbeds, going to from heel to mid arch, to forefoot 104 to under toes shown as 106, comprising but not limited to made with square magnet, gel, adhesive, etc. shown as 108-112 to hold down the Six Layers of Soul Support layer by layer i.e. materials, textures, layers, shown as 122, 124, and 126(Depicted in FIG. 1C.) that come with every pair of Soul SoxS. The insole, insert, footbed, etc. shown as 102 would be able to retain many layers of cushioning made of many different materials, textures, gels, sizes, widths, etc. The 6 Layer Support Technology is made of but not limited to a heavy-duty Checkered Rubber lining that conforms to your foot as shown on FIG. 1C, but can be optional or made from whatever texture, material, size, etc. the user prefers. 102 being the main receiving base would be able to retain many different materials whether its acupuncture points, gel, expanded foam, rubber liners, gel with plastic, etc. As seen in the FIG. 1A, the insole 102 would be able to magnetize, adhere, stick, etc. to insole, insert, footbed, etc. 104. 104 could be able to be many different textures as well as listed above and is located mid foot in front of arch in between toes. 104 would be able to have elevated textures, materials, gels, air bubbles, oil infused gel beds, etc. to alleviate whatever wellness, health, gait, etc. the user wants to customize. Insole 104 would also be able to be completely different textures, materials, sizes, widths, lengths, etc. and magnetize, adhere, gel lining, etc. to 102 with or without the support of 104. Whether it is an expanded foam, gel, ridged material, etc. in substitute of where insole/footbed 104 and or 106 would be. Depending on the size the user needs precut to magnetize and accommodate the main insole/foot base 102. Depicting sleeves/pockets/entry ways is 114-120, each of these would be able to intake and or retain any of the listed footbeds, insoles, etc. adhered together would make one complete insole to 102-106 insole/insert/footbeds with the main basin 102 going through entry points with 114 being most reasonable. 114-120 would be able to take in other textures, materials, sizes, widths, etc. that magnetize, adhere, etc. to the top of the 1-3 part insert, shown as 102-106 if so desired by the customer. comprised as square/strips/of magnetic copper etc. Depicted as 108-112 in FIG. 1A. the top part of the inserts/insoles/footbeds etc. shows magnets, adhesive lining, gel lining, etc. as 128-132 able to retain multiple layers of the Six Layers of Support or whatever texture, material, textile, etc. that the consumer would prefer to use where it could be gel/rubber/expanded foam/foam/etc. in all shapes, sizes, color, widths, lengths, etc. that rest in the respected insoles/inserts/footbeds etc. shown as 102-106

description.heading: FIG. 2A
description.p: The Soul SoxS depicted in this drawing show a calf high sock shown as 200 that has built in extra support 222 that folds down as shown with arrows pointing down from 220 into athletic sock and folds back up to mid high all the while providing extra ankle support, cushion, protection, etc. cushioning, padding that is built in for extra support shown as 222. It shows the sock 200 being able to have the main footbed/insert shown as 202, 204 mid foot and 206 able to retain materials, textures, gels, etc. on the magnetic square, adhesive, magnetic lining, etc. system and strips shown as 208, 210 and 212. 202 would be able to flip and alternate textures on some models i.e., gel to expanding foam, extra cushioned, etc. as 204 would because it is not the main sole stretching from heel to mid arch. 204 and 206 would be able to alternate textures, sizes, shapes, materials, etc. by flipping over the opposing side and It would come with the 6-layer system throughout 202-206 as all Soul SoxS do. As shown in FIG. 2A opening on heel of sock show as 214, mid arch shown as 216 and front area as 218 would be able to accept members 202-206 and be of access to any other type of material, textures, shapes, sizes etc. that attach to 202-206. 206 Is shown in FIG. 2B as the foremost of the foot and would not necessarily need to be used or connected with 202 and same with 204. All dependent on the users' needs and what ails them at the time. 220 would be able to fold up and down acting as a Mid-Calf Compression Sock then to fold and act as support to the heel, ankle, plantar area, arch, etc. once folded down then in turn act as a crew sock as the consumer pleases as well as the insert, textures, materials, etc. to better hold in place as well as being able 222-fold up for even more low/high ankle support/cushioning/etc. depending on what the user needs, feels, customizes, etc.
description.heading: FIG. 2B
description.p: The Soul SoxS shows an article of footwear i.e., a sock shown as 240 depicted in this drawing show a calf high sock 240 that has plantar fasciitis wrap shown as 248 for extra support. The sock also has extra ankle/heel cushioning depicted as 250-252. It shows the sock 240 being able to have the main footbed/insert 202 able to retain materials, textures, gels, etc. on the magnetic 6 square system and strips shown as 208. 202 would be able to flip and alternate sides changing textures i.e., gel to expanding foam, extra cushioned, etc. as 204 would because it is not the main sole stretching from 202 heel to mid arch. 204 would be able to alternate sides and change textures, sizes, shapes, materials, etc. by flipping over the opposing side and It would come with the 6-layer system throughout 202-206 as all Soul SoxS do. As shown in FIG. 2B 242-246 depicts openings, sleeves, slots, pockets, etc. on heel of sock shown as 242to the front part of the sock 242-246 as shown would be able to accept members 202-206 and be of access to any other type of material, textures, shapes, sizes etc. that wish to be attached to 202 and 204 and any added layers shown in FIG. 2B as the foremost of the foot and would not necessarily need to be used just always dependent on the user. As shown 248 Plantar Fasciitis Wrap would be able to hold the insert, textures, materials, etc. in place as well as being able fold up for even more low/high ankle support/cushioning/etc.
description.heading: FIG. 3A
description.p: The Soul SoxS depicted in this drawing shown as 300 depict an article of footwear/sock that has received the 6 Layered Support System shown as 302 and 304 able to be magnetized, adhered, gel, etc. together. It shows the sock 300 being able to have the main footbed/insert 302 able to retain materials, textures, gels, etc. shown as 312 and 314. The textures, materials, gels, etc. would be able to be elevated, layers removed, added, etc. 302 would be able to flip and alternate sides changing textures i.e., gel to expanding foam, extra cushioned, etc. dependent on the material it is as 304 would because it is not the main sole stretching from 302 heel to mid arch. Some models of Soul SoxS come solely with the 1-3-part system and 302 not being able to alternate sides. 304 would be able to alternate sides and change textures, sizes, shapes, materials, etc. by flipping over the opposing side and It would come with the 6-layer support system as shown in this FIGURE and FIG. 1C. As shown throughout 302-304 as all Soul SoxS do come with the 6 Layered Support. As shown in FIG. 3A 306-310 openings, sleeves, slots, pockets, etc. on heel of sock to the arch shown as 308 to front part of the sock shown as 310. 306-310 would be able to accept members 302-304 and be of access to any other type of material, textures, shapes, sizes etc. that wish to be attached to the Main Basin 302 and 304 forefoot area and any added layers shown in FIG. 3A. as 312-314 being able to retain any other type of material, texture, shapes, sizes, etc. as the foremost of the foot and would not necessarily need to be used within a slot, pocket, opening, etc. dependent on the consumers wants and needs. Consumer could always decide materials, gels, etc. as mentioned above without diverting from the materials, gels, etc.
description.heading: FIG. 4A-5B
description.p: Shown in FIG. 4A is a 400 Sock that has 6 options, 402-412 for openings, slots, pockets, etc. for the Soul SoxS inserts, insoles, footbed, textures, materials, etc. added as shown in previous FIGS. 1A-1C. These socks would have flaps/slots shown as 404 and 408 in this Figure. They would have gel lining on the interior to hold whatever materials, textures in place. 402, 406, 410, 412 would all be openings/slots to take in the Soul SoxS inserts, materials, textures, etc. able to take in the main base insert as shown in FIG. 1C. 122 the main base insert would be able to insert in through anyone of the entries listed above and shown throughout FIGS. 4A-5B. shown as Socks 400-520 Mostly going through the heel for the main base 122 insert or may go through the 404 and 408 middle, 406 and 410 sides, 412 toe areas, etc. Same goes for the remaining parts of the Soul SoxS 124 and 126 may as well use the entries listed above. Materials, textures, layers, shapes, sizes, etc. as well go through any one of these slots, pockets, sleeves, etc. shown as 422-430 in FIG. 4B. and depicted in the 420 Sock Soul SoxS. Socks 400-520 would all be able to accept various materials, textures, layers, shapes, sizes, inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. through the various slots, pockets, sleeves, etc. whether they are stitched, gel lined, spandex type of stretch, copper fibers, magnetic fibers, etc. that all Soul SoxS may be made of and all be in the 400-520 socks listed above.
description.heading: FIG. 6A
description.p: Depicted in FIG. 6A. is an article of footwear i.e. sock shown as 600 shows many slots, pockets, openings, etc. depicted as 602-608 for the front opening shown as 602 would be by opening at the top of the sock where users foot would enter, and where the opening, slots, pockets, etc. to retain the footbeds, gel beds, insoles, inserts, etc. such as 302-306, but not limited to said area if user would like to have The Soul SoxS depicted in this drawing shown as 600 depict an article of footwear/sock that has received the 6 Layered Support System i.e. inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. shown as 610 within the article of footwear 600 and 302-306 able to be magnetized, adhered, gel, etc. together. It shows the sock 600 being able to have the main footbed/insert 302 able to retain 3D printed materials, textures, gels, etc. shown as 312 and 314. The textures, materials, gels, etc. would be able to be elevated, layers removed, added, etc. 302 would be able to flip and alternate sides changing textures i.e., gel to expanding foam, extra cushioned, etc. dependent on the material it is as 304 would because it is not the main sole stretching from 302 heel to mid arch. This would give the user more support on said area of foot while providing a dividing line for the 1-3-part insert, insole, footbed, etc. to make it easier to stay in place. 620 shown in FIG. 6A. (not to be confused with the 620 depicted as an article of footwear i.c. extra compression sock in FIG. 6B.) would be a deeper heel slot, pocket, etc. with gel lining, magnets, adhesive, etc. to hold above mentioned arts Main Basin insole, insert, footbed, etc. 610 in place. description.heading: FIG. 6B
description.p: Shown in FIG. 6B. is a sock shown as 620 that has multiple flaps, tabs, no slip cushioned tips shown as 622. The no slip flaps, tabs, tips would be able to fold down into sections to provide more support on the upper calf, ankle, plantar area, etc. surfaces. 622 would fold down to 624 making an original high single compression into a double compressional mid-calf sock. If the customer were to fold down section 624 to 626 shown as the ankle area to make extra cushion. The customer would be able to decide what kind of support they would prefer from he sectioned compression Soul SoxS. Whether it is the Soul Tips, flaps, tabs shown as 622 being folded down to 624 to make double compression covering mid-calf or if they wanted to cover the heel opening, slot, pockets, etc. and mid arch area with more cushion and compression shown as 628 and 630 respectfully. The consumer would have the choice of having the Soul Flaps shown as 622 folded all the way down from 622 towards the heel shown as 628 to the mid arch shown as 630 to front foot shown as 632 covering the insole, insert, footbeds, shown as 634 and 636 and any materials, textures, gels, etc. added to magnets, adhesive, etc. shown as 638 and 640 on the bare footbed, insoles, inserts, etc. The inserts are shown with squared magnets to hold 6 Layers of Soul Support Technology. The consumer could always decide the texture, color, sizes, shapes, etc. for their inserts shown as 634 and 636. The arrows on 634 and 636 indicate that they can flip and alternate sides going from texture to texture whether it is a regular foot insert with expanded foam to gel lining for example. 634 and 636 could magnetize together if so, chosen by the wearer, whether it is stuck directly to it through the 6 layers or Soul Support or one on top of the other through magnets, adhesive, etc. All depends on what the wearer feels on each foot or section of foot. Ideally the main insert 634 would go through the heel opening, slot, pocket, etc. shown as 638. Depends on practicality of the shape, size, width, material, insert, etc. on which entries shown as 628-632 would go into.

description.heading: FIG. 7A. & 7B
description.p: FIG. 7A. depicts a version of Soul SoxS that is just one solid insert, footbed, insole, made from gel, rubber, expanded foam, etc. shown as 720, depicted in FIG. 7A. shows gel lining, gel beds, etc. comprising of infusions such as CBD, THC(s) (Deltas), essential oils, etc. infused throughout the insole and when stepped on will automatically be infused back to user's touch of foot, sweat glands, calluses, etc. will benefit from the wellness of CBD, essential oils, essential vitamins, etc. and 740. The bendable Soul SoxS insert would be able to make entry through anyone of the slots, pockets, sleeves, etc. shown throughout the different drawings and depictions of Soul SoxS with the top opening of sock, heel or arch area being the most reasonable but is completely up to user and what works best for them. The single insert has ribbed and ridged layers of rubber on the upper half of insert shown as 722 in FIG. 7A. that is made of a bendable rubber that is raised, textured on the ridged and ribbed 722 area. The middle arch to near bottom heel of of insert shown as 724 would be made from a gel like material that would also be ridged, raised, ribbed, etc. The intriguing parts about the single insert as opposed to the other version of Soul SoxS shown throughout the drawings and descriptions is the sides depicted in FIG. 7A. as 724 is that they cup, air pocket, conform, etc. to solid ground when pressure is applied to FIG. 7A. They would bend with the consumers foot making like the complete opposite side of a normal insert, insole, footbed, etc. like FIG. 7B. shown as 740 is depicted as a normal footbed, insert, insole, etc. is shown with medial, lateral arch support like most inserts and Soul SoxS are made with. The heel gel area depicted as 724 would be able to cup and conform to the ground, surface, etc. that the user is pressing on. The upper area depicted as 722 in FIG. 7A. shows ridges, ribbed, gel, but on the opposite side of FIG. 7A. would be flat depicted in FIG. 7B shown as 742. As would the medial and lateral arch be raised as a normal insert would be cupping the heel and conforming to foot. The materials, textures, sizes, widths, etc. would all still be customizable. In FIG. 7B. would still be able to retain the 6 layers of support if so, chosen by wearer and customized to their liking as mentioned above.

claim.claim-text: 1. A customizable or personalized article of footwear, comprising: a sock, top attachment to the sock, supports a bottom attachment to sock, a personalized or customized footbed, insole, insert, etc., inserted into sock, gel lining, magnetic, adhesive lining, etc. within sock, through slots, pockets, openings, a personalized or customized footbed, insole, insert, etc., may be connected by adhesive, gel lining,

2. A customizable or personalized article of footwear as in claim 1, comprising: a sock top attachment to the sock, supports a bottom attachment to sock, a personalized or customized sock etc.-supports infusions of CBD, Essential Vitamins, Essential Oils, etc. a personalized or customized footbed, insole, insert, etc.—supports infusions of CBD, Essential Vitamins Fully custom socks made from a variety of customized materials, textures, sizes, shapes, designs, etc. that have multiple openings, slots, pockets, gel lining, magnetic bottom (either within sock or on bottom of sock) and within the sock to retain the multiple pieces of footbed, inserts, insoles, and smaller pieces i.e. added layers, textures, materials to both the outer, inner, bottom, top, etc. of the socks as well as the inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc. which would connect by magnets, gel adhesive, gel lining, etc. to make multiple sections of the insert, insole, footbed, and or as one full insert, insole, footbed, etc. but not limited to certain sizes, The insert, insole, footbeds, etc. being connected by magnets, gel adhesive, gel lining, etc. to be able to bend with user's foot as more comparable to an athletic shoe being a 1-3 part system, According to user's wants and needs may be infused manually as stated in the arts or be able to reinfuse with said substances above and if so chosen for example(s) listed in the listed arts directly onto the layers, layer by layer, or dependent on textures and materials that rest in a footbed, inserts, insoles, etc., i.e. gel beds that retain Coconut Oils, CBD, Essential Oils, Etc. Just depends on (any of the LISTED SUBSTANCES above could be filled in a plastic, ceramic, recycled materials i.e. baster like syringes with plastic needles that are able to refill, be pre filled depending how much the user needs and wants of MG's for CBD, and that is safe, etc. user would be able to use the syringes, basters, etc., that insert dosages directly into the gel bed replacing any empty gel bed plant based substances, non-plant substances, oils, fragrances, etc. pretty much Anything that can be used and infused as ways listed above and below in the arts to the substances that, etc. and for example the syringe, plastic baster, plastic syringe, ceramic syringe with a metal, plastic, ceramic, needle, or anything similar to a medical syringe, etc. could insert directly into gel retaining footbeds, different retaining layers, 3D printed materials, retaining deep heel cups gel beds, or any sizes or any other part of the insole, insert, footbed, that could accept different substances can retain the (ABOVE LISTED SUBSTANCES) such as THC, CBD oils or any type of infusions of Essential Oils etc. The areas of inserts, insoles, footbeds, etc, that retain the actual layers, textures, materials, etc. would be able to be in variety of all different sizes to retain many different MG's of CBD, THC, Essential oils. Fragrances, plant-based substances, non-plant base substances ETC. for example see FIG. 1A as seen 102 could be a certain number of MG of CBD, as 104 could be an essential oil(s) as 106 could be a fragrance, etc. as the user would be able to have gel beds, textures, materials pre filled within retaining footbed , materials, layers, etc. that may roll on straight to textures, i.e. similar to highlighter sized deodorant stick, lip stick sized roller prefilled sticks, where user can manually infuse the layers infuse, how much they infused, and if they want infusions at all., textures, materials that lay and rest within the insole, inserts, footbeds, etc. and that come infused to customer's customization on what oils if any they want chosen listed but not limited to CBD, THC, THC Delta 9, Plant Based Substances, Non Plant Based Substances, Etc. and act similar to a Tide White out pens where user directly infuses the layers by rolling on the pens, etc. could know on certain models without diverting from original invention.
